characters.name: Stephen the TV Reporter
characters.description: Stephen is a recurring character who appears as a TV reporter in the Friday Saga series. Known for his professional yet often comedic reporting style, Stephen brings a unique perspective to the events unfolding in the saga.
details: Stephen serves as a narrative device, providing commentary and context to the events in the Friday Saga.
His reporting style often adds humour and levity to the series.
As a character from LUKETV, he represents the media perspective within the saga's universe.

characters.name: Yawanto
characters.description: Yawanto is a ghost who whispers into the main character Luke's ear, encouraging him to continue making Friday videos. The character is accompanied by the soundtrack from Annihilation, which has since become a meme sound across the internet.
details: Yawanto appears as a spectral presence, whispering encouragement to Luke about continuing the Friday video series.
The character is associated with the Annihilation soundtrack, which has gained popularity as an internet meme.
Serves as a motivational force within the narrative, representing the drive to continue creating content.
